channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
GitHub user smarthi opened a pull request:

https://github.com/apache/mahout/pull/80

MAHOUT-1652: Java 7 update

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

$ git pull https://github.com/smarthi/mahout Mahout-1652

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

https://github.com/apache/mahout/pull/80.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

This closes #80
